statements: SELECT * FROM research_papers;
SELECT title, author FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, author, keywords FROM research_papers WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, title, publication_date FROM research_papers WHERE keywords LIKE '%science%';
SELECT * FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date DESC, author ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, title, author, publication_date FROM research_papers WHERE author='John Doe'
SELECT title, author, keywords FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY author ASC
SELECT id, abstract FROM research_papers WHERE keywords LIKE '%machine learning%'
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE author='Alice Smith' OR author='Bob Brown' ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT * FROM research_papers;
SELECT paper_title, authors, publication_date FROM research_papers;
SELECT paper_id, paper_title, authors FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM scientific_data ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT data_name, data_type, data_value FROM scientific_data WHERE data_value > 100;
SELECT paper_id, paper_title, authors, publication_date, abstract FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT paper_title, authors FROM research_papers WHERE authors LIKE '%Alice%' ORDER BY paper_title ASC;
SELECT paper_id, paper_title, abstract FROM research_papers WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(abstract) > 500 ORDER BY paper_id;

SELECT data_id, data_name, data_type, data_value, research_papers.paper_title FROM scientific_data INNER JOIN research_papers ON scientific_data.paper_id = research_papers.paper_id WHERE data_type = 'experiment' ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_papers JOIN scientific_data ON research_papers.paper_id = scientific_data.paper_id WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM research_papers;
SELECT title, author FROM research_papers WHERE published_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT paper_id, author, abstract FROM research_papers WHERE title LIKE 'Machine Learning%';
SELECT title, author, published_date FROM research_papers ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM research_papers WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE published_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY paper_id DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(paper_id) AS num_papers FROM research_papers GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(paper_id) > 3;
SELECT title, author, abstract FROM research_papers WHERE title ILIKE '%machine learning%' ORDER BY published_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT cited_paper_id, COUNT(citation_id) AS num_citations FROM citations GROUP BY cited_paper_id ORDER BY num_citations DESC;
SELECT r.title, k.keyword FROM research_papers r INNER JOIN keywords k ON r.paper_id = k.paper_id WHERE k.keyword = 'AI';
SELECT * FROM ResearchPapers LIMIT 5;
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM ResearchPapers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, title, author, topic FROM ResearchPapers WHERE topic = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT author_name, affiliation, email FROM Authors WHERE author_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT rp.title, k.keyword_text FROM ResearchPapers rp JOIN PaperKeywords pk ON rp.id = pk.paper_id JOIN Keywords k ON pk.keyword_id = k.keyword_id;
SELECT id, title, author FROM ResearchPapers WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM Authors WHERE author_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY affiliation DESC;
SELECT title, abstract FROM ResearchPapers WHERE topic = 'Machine Learning' AND author = 'Alice' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT author_name, email FROM Authors JOIN PaperKeywords ON Authors.author_id = PaperKeywords.paper_id WHERE keyword_id = 1;
SELECT title, author, topic FROM ResearchPapers JOIN PaperKeywords ON ResearchPapers.id = PaperKeywords.paper_id WHERE PaperKeywords.keyword_id = 3 ORDER BY title;
SELECT * FROM research_papers;
SELECT title, authors FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT paper_id, title, authors, publication_date FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, authors, abstract FROM research_papers WHERE title ILIKE '%machine learning%';
SELECT paper_id, title, authors, publication_date FROM research_papers WHERE authors ILIKE '%John Doe%';
SELECT * FROM research_papers WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, authors, publication_date FROM research_papers WHERE abstract LIKE '%machine learning%';
SELECT paper_id, title, authors, publication_date FROM research_papers ORDER BY publication_date DESC;

SELECT research_papers.title, research_topics.topic_name FROM research_papers INNER JOIN paper_topics ON research_papers.paper_id = paper_topics.paper_id INNER JOIN research_topics ON paper_topics.topic_id = research_topics.topic_id;
SELECT authors, COUNT(*) as papers_count FROM research_papers GROUP BY authors HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
